T02bsu051_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma
T02bsu051_u:5: jetavane' nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārthaṃ trayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ |
T02bsu051_u:6: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
T02bsu051_u:7: atha khalu bhagavān śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmya pādau prakṣālya nyaṣīdatprajñapta evāsane paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhīṃ smṛtimupasthāpya |
T02bsu051_u:8: atha khalu saṃbahulā bhikṣavo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāman |
T02bsu051_u:9: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirabhivandya bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdan tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān subhutistasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito
T02bsu051_u:11: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan, paramāścaryaṃ sugata, yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītāḥ
T02bsu051_u:13: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parīnditāḥ paramayā parīndanayā
T02bsu051_u:14: | tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ
T02bsu051_u:16: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
T02bsu051_u:20: tena hi subhūte śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te - yathā bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyaṃ yathā pratipattavyaṃ yathā cittaṃ pragrahītavyam |
T02bsu051_u:23: cittamutpādayitavyam - yāvantaḥ subhūte sattvāḥ sattvadhātau sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītā aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñino
T02bsu051_u:24: vā, yāvān kaścitsattvadhātuḥ prajñapyamānaḥ prajñapyate, te ca mayā sarve
T02bsu051_u:26: evamaparimāṇānapi sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati |
T02bsu051_u:28: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta, na sa bodhisattva iti vaktavyaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:29: tatkasya hetoḥ? na sa subhūte bodhisattvo vaktavyo yasya
T02bsu051_u:30: sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta, jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā va pravarteta || 3 ||
T02bsu051_u:31: (Vajr, Vaidya 76) api tu khalu punaḥ subhute na bodhisattvena vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam, na kvacitpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam |
T02bsu051_u:34: evaṃ hi sūbhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet
T02bsu051_u:36: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti, tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇāmudgrahītum |
T02bsu051_u:37: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan |
T02bsu051_u:38: bhagavānāha - evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu adha ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu samantāddaśasu dikṣu sukaramākāśasya
T02bsu051_u:41: bodhisattvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti, tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum
T02bsu051_u:42: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet || 4 ||
T02bsu051_u:43: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ? subhūtirāha -
T02bsu051_u:47: hetoḥ? yā sā bhagavan lakṣaṇasaṃpattathāgatena bhāṣitā saivālakṣaṇasaṃpat
T02bsu051_u:48: | evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat yāvatsubhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanmṛṣā, yāvadalakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanna mṛṣeti hi lakṣaṇālakṣaṇatastathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ || 5 ||
T02bsu051_u:50: kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne, ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne guṇavantaḥ śīlavantaḥ prajñāvantaśca bhaviṣyanti, ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñāmutpāadayiṣyanti na khalu punaste subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti, naikabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti |
T02bsu051_u:51: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitā anekabuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
T02bsu051_u:52: bhaviṣyanti, ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu ekacittaprasādamapi pratilapsyante
T02bsu051_u:54: buddhajñānena, dṛṣṭāste subhūte tathāgatena buddhacakṣuṣā, buddhāste subhūte tathāgatena |
T02bsu051_u:55: sarve te subhūte aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti |
T02bsu051_u:56: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmātmasaṃjñā pravartate, na sattvasaṃjñā, na
T02bsu051_u:58: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartate |
T02bsu051_u:60: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartate |
T02bsu051_u:62: sacetsubhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
T02bsu051_u:63: sa eva teṣāmātmagrāho bhavet, sattvagrāho jīvagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāho bhavet |
T02bsu051_u:64: sacedadharmasaṃjñā pravarteta, sa eva teṣāmātmagrāho bhavet, sattvagrāho
T02bsu051_u:66: tatkasya hetoḥ? na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharma udgrahītavyo nādharmaḥ
T02bsu051_u:67: tasmādiyaṃ tathāgatena saṃdhāya vāgbhāṣitā - kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyamājānadbhidharmā eva prahātavyāḥ prāgevādharmā iti || 6 ||
T02bsu051_u:68: punaraparaṃ bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte, asti sa kaściddharmo
T02bsu051_u:70: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirityabhisaṃbuddhaḥ, nāsti dharmo yastathāgatena
T02bsu051_u:72: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo 'sau tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito
T02bsu051_u:77: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, api nu sa
T02bsu051_u:78: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt |
T02bsu051_u:79: subhūtirāha - bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt |
T02bsu051_u:80: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo 'sau bhagavan puṇyaskandhastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ, askandhaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:83: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, yaśca ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo vistareṇa deśayet saṃprakāśayet, ayameva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyasaṃkhyeyam |
T02bsu051_u:87: tatkasya hetoḥ? buddhadharmā buddhadharmā iti subhūte abuddhadharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ
T02bsu051_u:89: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan |
T02bsu051_u:90: na srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti |
T02bsu051_u:92: hetoḥ? na hi sa bhagavan kaṃciddharmamāpannaḥ, tenocyate srotaāpanna iti |
T02bsu051_u:93: na rūpamāpanno na śabdān na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān dharmānāpannaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:96: mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti, sa eva tasyātmagrāho bhavet,
T02bsu051_u:98: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati -
T02bsu051_u:99: mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan |
T02bsu051_u:100: sa sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā (Vajr, Vaidya 78) sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti |
T02bsu051_u:101: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sa kaściddharmo yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvamāpannaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:103: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati -
T02bsu051_u:104: mayānāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan |
T02bsu051_u:105: na anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti |
T02bsu051_u:107: na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo 'nāgāmitvamāpannaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:109: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu arhata evaṃ bhavati - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan |
T02bsu051_u:110: nārhata evaṃ bhavati - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti |
T02bsu051_u:111: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo 'rhannāma |
T02bsu051_u:113: sacedbhagavan arhata evaṃ bhavet - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti, sa eva tasyātmagrāho bhavet,
T02bsu051_u:115: tatkasya hetoḥ? ahamasmi bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena araṇāvihāriṇāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ ahamasmi bhagavan arhan vītarāgaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:118: sacenmama bhagavannevaṃ bhavet - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti, na māṃ tathāgato vyākariṣyadaraṇāvihāriṇāmagryaḥ subhūtiḥ kulaputro na kvacidviharati, tenocyate araṇāvihārī araṇāvihārīti
T02bsu051_u:119: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhata - samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ?
T02bsu051_u:121: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ
T02bsu051_u:122: bhagavānāha - yaḥ kaścitsubhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ kṣetravyūhān niṣpādayiṣyāmīti, sa vitathaṃ vadet |
T02bsu051_u:123: tatkasya hetoḥ? kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
T02bsu051_u:125: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam |
T02bsu051_u:127: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyo yattasyaivaṃ rūpa ātmabhāvaḥ syāt tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:128: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu mahān sa ātmabhāvo bhavet? subhūtirāha - mahān sa bhagavān,
T02bsu051_u:131: bhagavan na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:133: na hi bhagavan sa bhāvo nābhāvaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:135: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ
T02bsu051_u:136: vālukāstāvatya eva gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ? tāsu yā vālukāḥ, api nu tā bahvayo
T02bsu051_u:137: bhaveyuḥ? subhūtirāha - tā eva tāvadbhagavan bahvayo gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ,
T02bsu051_u:141: yāvatyastāsu gaṅgānadīṣu vālukā bhaveyustāvato lokadhātūn kaścideva strī vā puruṣo vā saptaratnaparipurṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, tat kiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu sā strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ bahu
T02bsu051_u:142: puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt? subhūtirāha - bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam |
T02bsu051_u:143: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā tāvato
T02bsu051_u:145: samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ito
T02bsu051_u:147: saṃprakāśayet, ayameva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya bhāṣyeta vā saṃprakāśyeta vā, sa pṛthivīpradeśaścaityabhūto bhavet sadevamānuṣāsurasya
T02bsu051_u:148: lokasya, kaḥ punarvādo ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāptaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti |
T02bsu051_u:149: parameṇa te subhūte āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
T02bsu051_u:150: tasmiṃśca subhūte pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ || 12
T02bsu051_u:151: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ko nāma ayaṃ bhagavan
T02bsu051_u:152: dharmaparyāyaḥ, kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - prajñāpāramitā nāmāyaṃ subhūte dharmaparyāyaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:154: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaiva subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena
T02bsu051_u:157: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena
T02bsu051_u:160: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajaḥ kaccit, tadbahu bhavet? subhūtirāha - bahu
T02bsu051_u:162: tatkasya hetoḥ? yattadbhagavan pṛthivīrajastathāgatena bhāṣitam, arajastadbhagavaṃstathāgatena bhāṣitam |
T02bsu051_u:172: tatkasya hetoḥ? yāni hi tāni bhagavan dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāni,
T02bsu051_u:175: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā dine dine gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet, evaṃ parityajan gaṅgānadīvālukāsamān kalpāṃstānātmabhāvān parityajet, yaśca ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhyaparebhyo deśayet
T02bsu051_u:176: saṃprakāśayet, ayameva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirdharmavegenāśrūṇi prāmuñcat |
T02bsu051_u:177: so 'śrūṇi pramṛjya bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan, paramāścaryaṃ sugata, yāvadayaṃ dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣito 'grayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
T02bsu051_u:180: na mayā bhagavan jātvevaṃrūpo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ
T02bsu051_u:181: | parameṇa te bhagavan āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti, ye iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe śrutvā bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti |
T02bsu051_u:183: yā caiṣā bhagavan bhūtasaṃjñā, saiva abhūtasaṃjñā |
T02bsu051_u:185: na mama bhagavan āścaryaṃ yadahamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇamavakalpayāmi adhimucye |
T02bsu051_u:187: bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne, ye imaṃ bhagavan
T02bsu051_u:189: parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti, te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā
T02bsu051_u:191: api tu khalu punarbhagavan na teṣāmātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
T02bsu051_u:192: na sattvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate, nāpi teṣāṃ kācitsaṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartate |
T02bsu051_u:197: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvasaṃjñāpagatā hi buddha bhagavantaḥ ||
T02bsu051_u:200: paramāścaryasamanvāgatāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti, ye iha subhūte
T02bsu051_u:201: sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe notrasiṣyanti na (Vajr, Vaidya 81) saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante
T02bsu051_u:202: tatkasya hetoḥ? paramapāramiteyaṃ subhūte tathāgatena bhāṣitā yadutāpāramitā |
T02bsu051_u:203: yāṃ ca subhūte tathāgataḥ paramapāramitāṃ bhāṣate, tāmaparimāṇā api buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante
T02bsu051_u:205: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā, saiva apāramitā |
T02bsu051_u:206: tatkasya hetoḥ? yadā me subhūte kalirājā aṅgapratyaṅgamāṃsānyacchaitsīt,
T02bsu051_u:207: nāsīnme tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā sattvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā, nāpi me kācitsaṃjñā vā asaṃjñā vā babhūva |
T02bsu051_u:209: hetoḥ? sacenme subhūte tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā abhaviṣyat,
T02bsu051_u:211: sacetsattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā pudgalasaṃjñābhaviṣyat, vyāpādasaṃjñāpi me tasmin samaye 'bhaviṣyat
T02bsu051_u:212: tatkasya hetoḥ? abhijānāmyahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani pañca jātiśatāni yadahaṃ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūvam |
T02bsu051_u:214: sattvasaṃjñā, na jīvasaṃjñā, na pudgalasaṃjñā babhūva |
T02bsu051_u:215: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitavyam |
T02bsu051_u:216: na rūpapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam, na śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam, na dharmapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam,
T02bsu051_u:219: tasmādeva tathāgato bhāṣate - apratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena dānaṃ
T02bsu051_u:222: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena evaṃrūpo dānaparityāgaḥ kartavyaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya
T02bsu051_u:223: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā caiṣā subhūte sattvasaṃjñā,
T02bsu051_u:225: ya evaṃ te sarvasattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāsta eva asattvāḥ
T02bsu051_u:226: | tatkasya hetoḥ? bhūtavādī subhūte tathāgataḥ, satyavādī tathāvādī ananyathāvādī tathāgataḥ, na vitathavādī tathāgataḥ ||
T02bsu051_u:227: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yastathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito
T02bsu051_u:228: nidhyātaḥ, na tatra satyaṃ na mṛṣā |
T02bsu051_u:230: 'ndhakārapraviṣṭo na kiṃcidapi paśyet, evaṃ vastupatito bodhisattvo
T02bsu051_u:232: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ prabhātāyāṃ rātrau sūrye 'bhyudgate nānavidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet, evamavastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo 'vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
T02bsu051_u:233: parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti, (Vajr, Vaidya 82) jñātāste subhūte tathāgatena buddhajñānena, dṛṣṭāste subhūte tathāgatena
T02bsu051_u:235: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā purvāhṇakālasamaye gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet, evaṃ madhyāhnakālasamaye gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet, sāyāhnakālasamaye gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet, anena paryāyeṇa bahūni
T02bsu051_u:236: kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇyātmabhāvān parityajet, yaścemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pratikṣipet, ayameva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ
T02bsu051_u:239: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo 'tulyo 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:242: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
T02bsu051_u:243: parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti, jñātāste subhūte tathāgatena
T02bsu051_u:244: buddhajñānena, dṛṣṭāste subhūte tathāgatena buddhacakṣuṣā, buddhāste tathāgatena |
T02bsu051_u:245: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyeṇa puṇyaskandhenāṃ samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
T02bsu051_u:247: sarve te subhūte sattvāḥ samāṃśena bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyanti vacayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti |
T02bsu051_u:249: subhūte ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hīnādhimuktiakaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrotum,
T02bsu051_u:251: nābodhisattvapratijñai sattvaiḥ śakyamayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotuṃ vā udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā |
T02bsu051_u:253: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yatra pṛthivīpradeśe idaṃ sūtraṃ
T02bsu051_u:254: prakaśayiṣyate, pūjanīyaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya |
T02bsu051_u:257: api tu ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
T02bsu051_u:258: yoniśaśca manasikariṣyanti, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti, te paribhūtā bhaviṣyanti, suparibhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti |
T02bsu051_u:259: tatkasya hetoḥ? yāni ca teṣāṃ subhūte sattvānāṃ paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi
T02bsu051_u:264: kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairdīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pareṇa paratareṇa caturaśītibuddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan ye
T02bsu051_u:266: yacca mayā subhūte te buddhā bhagavanta
T02bsu051_u:267: ārāgitāḥ, ārāgya na virāgitāḥ, yacca paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
T02bsu051_u:268: parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti, asya khalu punaḥ subhūte puṇyaskandhasyāntikādasau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ
T02bsu051_u:269: nopaiti, sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭimamipi koṭiśatatamīmapi koṭiśatasahasratamīmapi koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi |
T02bsu051_u:270: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniṣadamapi yāvadaupamyamapi na kṣamate ||
T02bsu051_u:271: sacetpunaḥ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā ahaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ bhāṣeyam, yāvatte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasmin samaye puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti, pratigrahīṣyanti, unmādaṃ sattvā anuprāpnuyuścittavikṣepaṃ
T02bsu051_u:273: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo 'tulyo 'yaṃ
T02bsu051_u:276: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam, kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam? bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - sarve sattvā mayā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ |
T02bsu051_u:277: evaṃ sa sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati |
T02bsu051_u:279: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta, na sa bodhisattva iti vaktavyaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:280: jīvasaṃjñā vā yāvatpudgalasaṃjñā vā pravarteta, na sa bodhisattva iti vaktavyaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:281: tatkasya hetoḥ? nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthito nāma ||
T02bsu051_u:282: (Vajr, Vaidya 84) tatkiṃ manyase subhūte asti sa kaściddharmo
T02bsu051_u:284: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
T02bsu051_u:285: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:287: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:288: sacetpunaḥ subhūte kaściddharmastathāgatenābhisaṃbuddho 'bhaviṣyat, na māṃ dīpaṃkarastathāgato vyākariṣyat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani
T02bsu051_u:290: yasmāttarhi subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo 'nuttarāṃ
T02bsu051_u:292: - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan
T02bsu051_u:294: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathāgata iti subhūte bhūtatathatāyā etadadhivacanam |
T02bsu051_u:298: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣa subhūte anutpādo yaḥ paramārthaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:299: yaḥ kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet - tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti, sa vitathaṃ vadet |
T02bsu051_u:302: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:304: 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā tatra na satyaṃ na mṛṣā |
T02bsu051_u:309: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyaḥ? āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - yo 'sau bhagavaṃstathāgatena puruṣo bhāṣita upetakāyo mahākāya iti, akāyaḥ sa bhagavaṃstathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:312: yo bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmiti, na sa bodhisattva iti vaktavyaḥ
T02bsu051_u:314: asti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo nāma? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan |
T02bsu051_u:315: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo (Vajr, Vaidya 85) nāma |
T02bsu051_u:316: bhagavānāha - sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte asattvāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ,
T02bsu051_u:318: tasmāttathāgato bhāṣate - nirātmānaḥ sarvadharmā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpudgalāḥ sarvadharmā iti ||
T02bsu051_u:319: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ kṣetravyūhānniṣpādayiṣyāmīti, sa vitathaṃ vadet
T02bsu051_u:320: tatkasya hetoḥ? kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
T02bsu051_u:322: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo nirātmāno dharmā nirātmāno dharmā ityadhimucyate,
T02bsu051_u:324: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - saṃvidyate tathāgatasya māṃsacakṣuḥ? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan, saṃvidyate tathāgatasya māṃsacakṣuḥ |
T02bsu051_u:325: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya divyaṃ cakṣuḥ? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan, saṃvidyate tathāgatasya divyaṃ cakṣuḥ |
T02bsu051_u:326: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya prajñācakṣuḥ? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan, saṃvidyate tathāgatasya prajñācakṣuḥ |
T02bsu051_u:330: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya buddhacakṣuḥ? subhūtirāha
T02bsu051_u:332: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
T02bsu051_u:333: api nu tā vālukāstathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan,
T02bsu051_u:336: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ, tāvatya eva gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ, tāsu vā vālukāḥ, tāvantaśca lokadhātavo bhaveyuḥ,
T02bsu051_u:340: bhagavānāha - yāvantaḥ subhūte teṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, teṣāmahaṃ nānābhāvāṃ cittadhārāṃ
T02bsu051_u:342: tatkasya hetoḥ? cittadhārā cittadhāreti subhūte adhāraiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā, tenocyate cittadhāreti
T02bsu051_u:343: tatkasya hetoḥ? atītaṃ subhūte cittaṃ nopalabhyate |
T02bsu051_u:346: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, api nu (Vajr, Vaidya 86) sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt?
T02bsu051_u:350: bahu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaḥkhyeyam
T02bsu051_u:351: tatkasya hetoḥ? puṇyaskandhaḥ puṇyaskandha iti subhūte askandhaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:353: sacet punaḥ subhūte puṇyaskandho 'bhaviṣyat, na tathāgato 'bhāṣiṣyat puṇyaskandhaḥ puṇyaskandha iti || 19 ||
T02bsu051_u:354: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ?
T02bsu051_u:357: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpakāyapariniṣpattī rūpakāyapariniṣpattiriti bhagavan apariniṣpattireṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā |
T02bsu051_u:359: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ?
T02bsu051_u:362: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaiṣā bhagavan lakṣaṇasaṃpattathāgatena bhāṣitā,
T02bsu051_u:365: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati -
T02bsu051_u:366: mayā dharmo deśita iti? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā dharmo deśita iti |
T02bsu051_u:368: tathāgatena dharmo deśita iti, sa vitathaṃ vadet |
T02bsu051_u:370: tatkasya hetoḥ? dharmadeśanā dharmadeśaneti subhūte nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo dharmadeśanā nāmopalabhyate ||
T02bsu051_u:371: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavan kecitsattvā
T02bsu051_u:372: bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne, ya imānevaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvā abhiśraddhāsyanti |
T02bsu051_u:373: bhagavānāha - na te subhūte sattvā nāsattvāḥ |
T02bsu051_u:374: tatkasya hetoḥ? sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte sarve te subhūte asattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
T02bsu051_u:376: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu asti sa kaściddharmaḥ,
T02bsu051_u:377: yastathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ?@ āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan
T02bsu051_u:378: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:381: aṇurapi tatra dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate |
T02bsu051_u:383: (Vajr, Vaidya 87) api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte samaḥ sa dharmo na tatra kaścidviṣamaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:385: nirātmatvena niḥsattvatvena nirjīvatvena niṣpudgalatvena samā sā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvaiḥ kuśalairdharmairabhisaṃbudhyate |
T02bsu051_u:387: kuśalā dharmāḥ kuśalā dharmā iti subhūte adharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
T02bsu051_u:389: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhute strī vā puruṣo vā yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumeravaḥ parvatarājānaḥ, tāvato rāśīn saptānāṃ
T02bsu051_u:390: ratnānāmabhisaṃhṛtya tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet, asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti, yāvadupaniṣadamapi na kṣamate || 24 ||
T02bsu051_u:391: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā sattvāḥ parimocitā iti? na khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam |
T02bsu051_u:394: yadi punaḥ subhūte kaścitsattvo 'bhaviṣyadyastathāgatena parimocitaḥ syāt, sa eva tathāgatasyātmagrāho 'bhaviṣyat, sattvagrāho jīvagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāho
T02bsu051_u:396: ātmagrāha iti subhūte agrāha eṣa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:398: bālapṛthagjanā iti subhūte ajanā eva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
T02bsu051_u:400: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ? subhūtirāha
T02bsu051_u:402: yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, na lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:406: tatkasya hetoḥ? sacetpunaḥ subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyo 'bhaviṣyat, rājāpi cakravartī tathāgato 'bhaviṣyat |
T02bsu051_u:410: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata -
T02bsu051_u:411: ye māṃ rūpeṇa cādrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa cānvaguḥ |
T02bsu051_u:412: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ || 1 ||
T02bsu051_u:413: dharmato buddho draṣṭavyo dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ |
T02bsu051_u:414: dharmatā ca na vijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum || 2 || 26 ||
T02bsu051_u:415: (Vajr, Vaidya 88) tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā? na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam |
T02bsu051_u:416: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā syāt |
T02bsu051_u:417: na khalu punaste subhūte kaścidevaṃ vadet - bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya
T02bsu051_u:419: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam |
T02bsu051_u:420: tatkasya hetoḥ? na bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñapto nocchedaḥ yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāṃllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo
T02bsu051_u:421: 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, yaśca bodhisattvo nirātmakeṣvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate, ayameva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavedaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ |
T02bsu051_u:423: puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ? bhagavānāha - parigrahītavyaḥ subhūte no
T02bsu051_u:426: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścidevaṃ vadet - tathāgato gacchati vā
T02bsu051_u:427: āgacchati vā tiṣṭhati vā niṣīdati vā, śayyāṃ vā kalpayati, na me subhūte
T02bsu051_u:429: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathāgata iti subhūte ucyate na kvacidgato na kutaścidāgataḥ |
T02bsu051_u:432: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanti trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajāṃsi, tāvatāṃ lokadhātūnāmevaṃrūpaṃ maṣiṃ kuryāt yāvadevamasaṃkhyeyena vīryeṇa
T02bsu051_u:433: tadyathāpi nāma paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ, tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusaṃcayo bhavet? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan, evametatsugata |
T02bsu051_u:435: tatkasya hetoḥ? sacedbhagavan bahuḥ paramāṇusaṃcayo 'bhaviṣyat, na bhagavānavakṣyat - paramāṇusaṃcaya iti |
T02bsu051_u:436: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo 'sau bhagavan paramāṇusaṃcayastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ,
T02bsu051_u:439: yaśca tathāgatena bhāṣitastrisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiti, adhātuḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ
T02bsu051_u:441: tatkasya hetoḥ? sacedbhagavan lokadhāturabhaviṣyat, sa eva piṇḍagrāho
T02bsu051_u:450: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hi kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet - ātmadṛṣṭistathāgatena
T02bsu051_u:451: bhāṣitā, sattvadṛṣṭirjīvadṛṣṭiḥ pudgaladṛṣṭistathāgatena bhāṣitā, api nu sa subhūte samyagvadamāno vadet? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan, no hīdaṃ sugata, na samyagvadamāno vadet |
T02bsu051_u:453: ātmadṛṣṭistathāgatena bhāṣitā, adṛṣṭiḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitā |
T02bsu051_u:455: bhagavānāha - evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sarvadharmā jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ |
T02bsu051_u:459: tatkasya hetoḥ? dharmasaṃjñā dharmasaṃjñeti subhūte asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā |
T02bsu051_u:461: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu051_u:463: 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, yaśca kulaputro vā
T02bsu051_u:464: kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya dhārayeddeśayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet, ayameva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam |
T02bsu051_u:467: svapnaṃ ca vidyudabhraṃ ca evaṃ draṣṭavya saṃskṛtam ||
T02bsu051_u:470: sthavirasubhūtiste ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti || 32
